title: Juggalo Apocalypse
description:
This week Meredith and Patton talk about Hell's Video Store, click bait, ICP and more!
Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
--
Go to magicspoon.com/TEXT to grab a custom bundle of cereal! And be sure to use our promo code TEXT at checkout to save five dollars off your order.

Right now it's time to reclaim your health and arm your immune system with convenient, daily nutrition. To make it easy, Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/text.

With Thrive Market, your membership means more--for families in need and our planet. Join today to get 40% off your first order AND a FREE gift worth over $50 at thrivemarket.com/text.

Peloton has a workout for every day and every schedule. De-stress from a long day with 30 minutes of strength and 20 minutes of cardio, or do a quick 15 minute total body class before work. Visit onepeloton.com to learn more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
